clues.text: Jeff Bezos settled on this name because it started with the first letter of the alphabet & implied something really large

In 1936 this company started as Government Employees Insurance Company, hence the name

Baudelaire:
"The devil's finest trick is to persuade you that he does not" this
This 17th c. work says, "Abashed the devil stood, and felt how awful goodness is... saw, and pined his loss"
The Book of Common Prayer: "From all the deceits of the world," this "and the devil, good Lord, deliver us"

John Donne:
"In best understandings, sin began, / angels sinn'd first, then devils, and then" him

rounds.comments: (Ken: Each correct response here will be two words identical except that one has an extra letter "B".)

rounds.text: Acquitted of shooting her lover in 1924, Beulah Annan was the inspiration for this character in a play, film & musical
